props.name: as
props.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwritten by `asChild`.

props.name: asChild
props.description:
Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.

Read our [Composition](https://akar.vinicunca.dev/core/guides/composition) guide for more details.

props.name: defaultPlaceholder
props.description: The default placeholder date

props.name: defaultValue
props.description: The default value for the calendar

props.name: dir
props.description:
The reading direction of the date field when applicable.
If omitted, inherits globally from `AConfigProvider` or assumes LTR (left-to-right) reading mode.

props.name: disabled
props.description: Whether or not the date field is disabled

props.name: granularity
props.description: The granularity to use for formatting times. Defaults to day if a CalendarDate is provided, otherwise defaults to minute. The field will render segments for each part of the date up to and including the specified granularity

props.name: hideTimeZone
props.description: Whether or not to hide the time zone segment of the field

props.name: hourCycle
props.description: The hour cycle used for formatting times. Defaults to the local preference

props.name: id
props.description: Id of the element

props.name: isDateUnavailable
props.description: A function that returns whether or not a date is unavailable

props.name: locale
props.description: The locale to use for formatting dates

props.name: maxValue
props.description: The maximum date that can be selected

props.name: minValue
props.description: The minimum date that can be selected

props.name: modelValue
props.description: The controlled checked state of the calendar. Can be bound as `v-model`.

props.name: name
props.description: The name of the field. Submitted with its owning form as part of a name/value pair.

props.name: placeholder
props.description: The placeholder date, which is used to determine what month to display when no date is selected. This updates as the user navigates the calendar and can be used to programmatically control the calendar view

props.name: readonly
props.description: Whether or not the date field is readonly

props.name: required
props.description: When `true`, indicates that the user must set the value before the owning form can be submitted.

props.name: step
props.description: The stepping interval for the time fields. Defaults to `1`.

events.name: update:modelValue
events.description: Event handler called whenever the model value changes

events.name: update:placeholder
events.description: Event handler called whenever the placeholder value changes

slots.name: segments
slots.type: { start: { part: SegmentPart; value: string; }[]; end: { part: SegmentPart; value: string; }[]; }

exposed.name: isDateUnavailable
exposed.description: A function that returns whether or not a date is unavailable
